data.title: Edgar Rice Burroughs Universe
data.meta_description: The Edgar Rice Burroughs Universe is the designation given to new media not written by Edgar Rice Burroughs, but still considered officially canon within the scope of his shared universe, as deemed by Edgar Rice Burroughs, Inc. The idea is that all of Burroughs' writing takes place in the same...
data.text:
The Edgar Rice Burroughs Universe is the designation given to new media not written by Edgar Rice Burroughs, but still considered officially canon within the scope of his shared universe, as deemed by Edgar Rice Burroughs, Inc. The idea is that all of Burroughs' writing takes place in the same universe, and these stories pick up where he left off.[1]

List of canon[]

Novels[]

Cover Title Author Release date Tarzan and the Valley of Gold Fritz Leiber April 1966 Mahars of Pellucidar John Eric Holmes February 1, 1976 Tarzan and the Dark Heart of Time Philip José Farmer June 1, 1999 Carson of Venus: The Edge of All Worlds Matt Betts April 7, 2020 Tarzan: Battle for Pellucidar Win Scott Eckert October 20, 2020 John Carter of Mars: Gods of the Forgotten Geary Gravel September 1, 2021 Tarzan and the Forest of Stone Jeffrey J. Mariotte June 21, 2022 Red Axe of Pellucidar John Eric Holmes September 6, 2022 Victory Harben: Fires of Halos Christopher Paul Carey November 1, 2022 Korak at the Earth's Core Win Scott Eckert April 2, 2024 A Princess of Mars: Shadow of the Assassins Ann Tonsor Zeddies 2024
